website_summaries.verdict: The combination of a fairly low price, semirigid and waterproof cable, adaptable LED brightness, and good video quality make the THZY endoscope a worthy and versatile purchase.
pros: Connects to iOS and Android devices via WiFi
Features six adjustable LEDs for high and low light areas
cons: As impressive as this inspection camera is, a dedicated zoom feature would have been the icing on the cake

customer_reviews.title: Was Almost Perfect ... Now Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as described. I'm taking one star off for two things: One is a product manual with type so small I had to use a magnifying glass to read it; Two is because there is a round switch on the control unit ... and nowhere does it explain what this switch does. If these two problem are fixed I would give it five stars. It's a very good product. UPDATE: Almost immediately after posting my review, I got an email from the manufacturer with a PDF version of the product manual that answered all of my questions. Thank you, thank you for your quick response! I have adjusted my review to give you five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Greensmith

customer_reviews.title: Black screen!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I may have received one of the duds. Paired with Motorola G5+ with Android 7. Confirmed I have the latest store version of the view app. Device is fully charged. Symptoms: Connects to my phone via the wifi method provided, blue light doesn't flicker and no picture transmits to my phone. App shows a black screen with the couple of buttons.
customer_reviews.author: John Q Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many high dollar industrial boroscopes for inspection purposes. You cannot beat this small endoscope wifi camera for the price. It has good picture and color quality. Even high end scopes do not have a far field of vision when viewing in dark or tubular areas. The only thing I wish this unit could do is to view on a PC or Laptop. The battery life is ok but when inspecting you can run into a time consuming project and waiting for your phone or the power pack to charge to resume can be impossible. Longevity of the unit is yet to be seen, time will tell. Good unit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, but length has it's problems
customer_reviews.text: So this is a cool thing to have, picture is good, easy to get going on your phone. I purchased the long one, 10m (about 30 ft) sounds good, but....... I used it to check out a sewer line, it's not stiff enough to push down the pipe. I taped it to an electrical fish tape, that made it stiff enough to push down the pipe. It gave me a good picture until a piece of toilet paper got stuck on the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Papachuck

customer_reviews.title: The casing for the battery and wifi is really cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: The casing for the battery and wifi is really cheap plastic, while the cable and camera end looks decent enough quality. But I was never able to use it as the iOS software refused to accept the WiFi SID or the password of 12345678. And I am not talking about the software accepting the input. You have two input fields for SID and password, with two buttons next to it labeled "Setting". This whole software feels very badly written, which the inability to enter SID and password just confirms.
customer_reviews.author: Ulf Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I think it will work for us -- we have yet to put it to any real task. I had to dig out an old phone, because although my current Android is nearly two years old, the THZY software will only work on the older Android. An update to the WiFi View app is greatly needed. The camera quality is poor -- Mars it is not. However, again, I believe it's as good as some security cameras. Don't get me wrong, I absolutely love the idea, and envision a multitude of tasks to be performed. I just feel Amazon should not sell something that is obviously outdated.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Wont work 8months from now.
customer_reviews.text: Camera itself works. But the problem is the app. The entire product depends on an Android or IOS app to work. Once Manufacturer stops supporting the app then your product becomes useless. That is what happened to me. Bought it Feb 2019....Dec 2019 the app stopped working and now I can't use the camera. No way to contact the seller even though they offer a 100% refund and Amazon won't accept the return because the return window has elapsed. Don't buy any wifi endoscopes.
customer_reviews.author: RK Medic

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Image is excellent. Wi-Fi connection to android 7.0 piece of cake. So much easier to control and view than boroscope attached directly to monitor. Have not tried to wiggle it 10m, which, I suspect would be a challenge! Several vendors offer the same product at the same price. I preferred blue over black - more visible in the dark. For another $10 wish they would put in a larger battery - 6 bright LEDs and Wi-Fi eat power, and shorten the camera head a bit so it could snake around tighter curves. Completely satisfied at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Battery life could be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device to scope an animal hole going under my house The device works as stated but there are a couple drawbacks. First the battery is good for about 20 mins then it's time to recharge. The cable isn't rigid enough go go more than about 5 ft in a large opening. I ended up attaching it to a fish tape to go further. If you were snaking a pipe it would probably work ok. Lastly to connect to the app I had to reboot my phone each time. Nothing was really a deal breaker but can't give it 5 stars because of the three items started.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.  Don't expect medical grade bright images, but it works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool technology, and it lets me see inside equipment and walls to give me an idea what I'm up against when building or rewiring or repairing. Runs off your camera's USB and battery. Image is pretty decent for the tiny camera and light. Seeing at 45 and 90 degrees is accomplished with clip-on mirrors; this isn't the best tech for getting the job done, but at the price it can't be beat. A brighter image, a local battery, and better color pictures with increased depth of field (deep focus) would be the trick to get this rated at a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Re Vue

customer_reviews.title: Be patient when first connecting!
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile but letting the battery fully charge seemed to help. The process is pretty straightforward after this, just follow the instructions here on on the included card. The variable LED lighting is very handy with a small thumbwheel letting you control brightness from off to turbo mode. This thing is pretty bright. I give it a provisional five star rating, let's see how it holds up in an industrial environment, searching for water and chemical leaks inside a cleanroom.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Leverson

customer_reviews.title: Ok value for the money. Worked once.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, I used mine to check out the sewers in a building that needs the concrete floor redone now I won't have to dig up the sewers to check. Cheeper than hiring a person who has something like it. It worked good the first time I used it, I got it out again to check my daughter's break pads and it connected fine but got grainy and showed 1/2 the picture and bottom 1/2 was pixelated garbage, the battery was full charge and I only used it about 5min. Now it has black screen no picture at all. If you need one more than once get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Good length, rigid wire for reaching distant objects.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these endoscopes, I purchased this one for the length of the camera line. The product arrived quickly, and the setup is simple. One of the LED's does not brightens as well as the rest, staying pretty dim. The camera and video quality is good. This one does not come with a case, which was supplied with my other ones. Comes with the standard attachment set, hook, mirror, magnet. This one has a more rigid wire which should be beneficial in reaching objects at a distance. Overall I am pleased with this endoscope.
customer_reviews.author: Ball Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Defective from the box.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and I put it on a 1 amp charger (cord was included charger wasn't) and after 12 hours the camera wouldn't turn on, I I switched it to a 2.0 amp charger and another 12 hours and still would not take a charge/turn on so I am returning this useless pile wire.....
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: I have a 30 foot drain that I have to check periodically and this endoscope does a great job. I take a movie and can review it to see where any obstructions are. I can check again after snaking it to make sure it is clean. I made a conical polyethylene foam piece wrapped with electrical tape to keep the camera head out of the muck. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Tom the Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed. Worked as expected. I was not sure something this inexpensive would actually connect to my phone and produce a live-view in a drain pipe (picture attached). Connected quickly after following included instructions. Not a problem of the product, I was hoping I would be able to get to the bottom of the drain pipe and get the camera to take a right turn and continue down the pipe. But once I got to the bottom, the cable just bunched up. So I was unableble to continue down the pipe to find my problem. It was a 3" drain pipe. But the endoscope worked better than expected. Beautiful video and pictures!
customer_reviews.author: BGuns

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my bag of tricks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend in Chile and he said it worked really well for boiler tube inspections prior to their installation. I decided to purchase one for the same purpose. It works great. The light control is very helpful in reducing overexposed views. The app for the iPad and I phone has not given any problems and has allowed me to present boiler tube internal inspections with out carrying around 50 lb of borescope, tv and electrical cords. A great addition to my bag of tricks!
customer_reviews.author: David Kittel

customer_reviews.title: paired set does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware.. The package deal that shows the: Supereyes Borescope Side View Mirror Set NA002-1 30 45 60 degrees for Borescope Endoscope N005 N013J N015 series to purchase with the : Wireless Endoscope THZY 1200P HD 10m WiFi Borescope Inspection Camera THe attachments are for an 8.5 mm threaded endoscope. The Bore scope these ware paired with is a 10mm non threaded endoscope. This mirror set should not be listed here for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary U.

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough, at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because the 30' length seemed like a good idea, and will be needed for future projects. I used it right away to look in the wall where a pocket door hides. It was easy-enough to set up - so long as I didn't try to follow the instructions too precisely, and didn't fiddle with any of the security settings. It worked pretty well, too, although I wish the wire was actually a little stiffer. (But practically, I could wrap it around a metal rod if I really need a straight-line reach.)
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great for it's purpose, but my battery doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, but the battery doesn't last very long. Great picture and bright light, and it holds it's shape so you can bend it to get in tough spots. Fully charged, the battery on mine only lasts maybe 20 or 30 minutes with the light on. Good enough for what I'm using it for in automotive troubleshooting. The battery on mine also dies after sitting for days on end, so I have to charge it at each use.
customer_reviews.author: snrusnak

customer_reviews.title: Battery goes fast and connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Battery goes fast and connection issues. Hard to navigate in the cavity and attachments are useless. Resolution is not very good either. Images were so distorted and looked like mould was growing in every wall cavity use surveyed. Opening up half the walls, we quickly realized the camera was complete garbage. The mould was actually bad pixelation and distortion of colours. Just bad, time wasting, and useless.
customer_reviews.author: Cobokk

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR PLUMBING.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not good for plumbing. You will not be able to get it past the first hang up and it will not turn corners. Don’t buy this to look inside your pipes. It won’t help you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry Moser

customer_reviews.title: Endoscope Excellent but App is a disaster
customer_reviews.text: This seems like an excellent device. Excellent image. But the App is the worst piece of software that I have every had on my iPhones. I am amazed that Apple allowed them to put this on their site. It locks up the iPhone X. Real crap. Even the display for this app on the Apple site is ugly and uninformative. I get the impression that this was an Android app that was ported over - badly. OS users, beware! UPDATE: I have returned this unit.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I needed a scope to look for a dead mouse someplace in my kitchen cabinets. ( I charged the unit overnight, downloaded the app and it hooked up with no issues. the hardest part was reading the small print in the instructions. Personally I believe it is very intuitive and just needed a couple of instructions like: 1)Download the "wifi view" app; 2) turn the unit on; 3) select the unit in your wifi settings and input the password (12345678). I would buy it again. I would not buy the hard case that was recommended. It was not large enough to accommodate the long cable easily.
customer_reviews.author: salmon-slayer

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: First the app to use this is only in Chinese only. When snaking the drain it was difficult to see anything. The focus was off and I couldn't adjust it. Maybe if the app was in other languages I could adjust the settings but I was winging it and pressing anything I could. The image outside of a dark area was clear but that's about it. Anything requiring the light pretty much sucked. After 40 minutes of trying to get this to work for my I just gave up. Spend more money and get a better product. This one is annoying and will only frustrate you.
customer_reviews.author: cid2042

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have some yard drains that weren't draining properly. I checked the local big box hardware store to rent a drain scope, but it was MUCH more expensive than I expected. So I jump on Amazon to see how ridiculously priced scopes were, but man, was I amazed when I found this camera! Not only was the price SUPER reasonable, but the product performed as well as I had hoped. I have found so many other uses for this, like looking inside a wall for a plumbing leak and poking around inside my holding tanks on my RV. I would recommend this product again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Zalewski

customer_reviews.title: Not very rigid
customer_reviews.text: One of the product images listed compares this camera with others and shows this being rigid. That is completely incorrect claim. This product is no where close to the rigidity claimed.
customer_reviews.author: DPK

customer_reviews.title: Minimal destructive investigation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get a view behind some finished walls in my basement. Overall the quality is pretty good for a $40 devise. I wound up getting some plastic tubing (electrical conduit) so I could guide the camera head to the approximate location I needed a view of. I don't know that the wire could be more rigid but using the conduit worked pretty well and that only cots a couple of bucks at me nearby home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: James O.

customer_reviews.title: Saved me $500
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t write reviews, but this product helped me save a ton of unesccery plumbing work. Noticed I started having a sewage smell in my house. I called the plumbers who said they wanted to do a smoke test to see if I have a leak that would cost around $500. I said no, and did my own investigating with this camera. Sure enough I was able to find a blockage in my vent stack with this camera. I recommend this to all my friends. Very easy to use and very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for in old homes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this for our 1890s home repairs and updates. We can see in the walls and make sure we are running cables to the right place. You will want to use it with a fish tape to keep it sturdy in some cases. Only wish the battery lasted longer but for the price I'm good with it. We will purchase one for my father in law.
customer_reviews.author: Millie A.

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does a decent job in short runs. When I try to go more than 5 feet in a confined space you can’t control the direction. If inside a pipe it might be better. But trying to go through a ceiling joist the camera head is difficult to direct. Maybe the cord is too long. Overall it is a good unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: This endoscope is really good. The app works great on my Android and ...
customer_reviews.text: This endoscope is really good. The app works great on my Android and the app didn't want access to anything it shouldn't need. Resolution is adjustable through the app and is very clear. I like the adjustable brightness of the lights by the camera too. Everything is very intuitive and I have nothing to complain about with it. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dimoe

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I got what was described.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I got what was described. But WARNING this is not waterproof. The description doesn't say that it's waterproof I simply assumed it was. Mistake on my part. Great product though!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Burkeen

customer_reviews.title: Good video resolution at proper distances
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to try to inspect a bathtub drain. The image was crisp and clear until it got into standing water. Even with the LEDs at full brightness, it still will not penetrate even clean water enough to give you a clear picture of what is in there. I also suspect that since the camera was starting into the trap, that the length of the camera head could not make the bend and was too close to the sidewall of the trap to get a clear image. However, for $40, this is an excellent camera. I can think of many other great uses for it where it would perform spectacularly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable LED’s, great picture.
customer_reviews.text: So far this endoscope works great, really love the adjustable LED’s! (Roll control is on battery charge/ WiFi box, same side as on/off) Manual doesn’t show it) Camera works great on all of the multiple resolution settings. Can’t really say about the battery life, haven’t used it long enough to really give the batteries a good test. But so far it’s done it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: R D M

customer_reviews.title: Defect in 10 min of use
customer_reviews.text: I have now tried this out twice for a grand total of ten minutes. It has been jept in a climate controlled space . New un box never even unrolled the cable ehen the endoscope lights fail to work on any setting or level of charge. . I am haopy with replacement or refund. is there a new version / model number of this endoscope ? Or new tech?
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Only worked the first day :(
customer_reviews.text: I tried it out the day I received it, downloaded the app into my phone and it worked great!! Good picture quality. the next day when I went to use it again it doesn't work. it turns on and everything but there's no Wi-Fi signal to be found. Solid blur=e light is on below the Wi-Fi indicator and the LEDs for the camera turn on, but I can't connect to the phone thus no image. I tried contacting customer service through their website and nothing! Update: It's may 20 and still no response from the seller or Amazon :{
customer_reviews.author: Lopez Molina

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised! Saved me a lot of time!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to take a look behind a stone veneer fireplace to make sure there was enough support structure to hang my TV. It worked like a charm -- I did not have to knock out some stones to check and was able to locate the studs to attach the TV mount to. Definitely recommend the purchase to add to your homeowners toolbox :)
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Junk dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage, does not work, just black screen on "software" if you want to even call it that. Tried with multiple Android devices and computer same deal. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Mark Saverice

customer_reviews.title: ... was not able to use it at all very disappointed not sure why he has the correct iOS says ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father he has an Apple phone he opened it and said that he was not able to use it at all very disappointed not sure why he has the correct iOS says he needs something for Android quite disappointed can you tell me why or what he would need to make this device work for his Apple iPhone 6
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is well built and the coil/cord is the perfect stiffness allowing movement through pipes but not too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Thousands of uses! This is well built and the coil/cord is the perfect stiffness allowing movement through pipes but not too stiff. WiFi setup is super easy and the app is excellent. Once your phone/tablet remembers the network just click it again in your network settings when you start the device. Really like the ability to capture video and stills. Don't forget that the light is on a reostat so if it is dim when first turned on adjust the brightness with the wheel on the brain box. Adjustable brightness is good depending on what the camera is moving through. Camera is super clear. Good stuff here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work, Period!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box. The manufacturer has not updated the app in 3yrs rendering this expensive item useless. A complete waste of hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price. Easy to set up and use. Update : broke the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to visualize and remove old DIY stereo wiring from previous owner. Worked great and was easy to set up. Update: broke the second time I used it. Went to plug-in the usb charger and the part that you plug it into fell back into the base. Now I cant get it to connect to WiFi or charge.
customer_reviews.author: Akiva86

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell, but it looks good so far
customer_reviews.text: Received the product today which was quick with Prime(2days). The camera came in a decent looking box that protected the camera nicely. It was pretty easy to hook up to my phone and I had it running within minutes. I clean dryer vents for a living so I wanted to be able to show my customers what their vent looks like before and after the cleaning process. I cant wait to try it out for real tomorrow. Seems like good enough quality for a $30 product, time will tell how long it works but I look forward to working with it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: and the image is so bad that I might as well throw the flip phone ...
customer_reviews.text: junk. wont connect to phone or ipad. finally got it to connect to an old flip phone, and the image is so bad that I might as well throw the flip phone down the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Works well, can be reset if necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Scope works well. I attempted to change the WiFi SSID and password, thought I did it correctly, but could not connect to scope's WiFi after change. I read other comments that said scope could not be reset to factory defualts. I found a reset button inside the unit. First I gently pried open case with a thin screwdriver around the perimeter. Then with unit powered on, I kept the reset button depressed (about 10 seconds) until the unit's LEDs flashed off. The unit rebooted and came up with the default factory SSID and password, and I was able to connect to it again. Case pressed back together just fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and Super Useful
customer_reviews.text: I received this 3 days ago and already used it to view the inside of a wall where I needed to run a wire. I could not be happier; it worked great and the lights on the end were sufficient to let me see if I had a clear path (I did). Worth the investment. Also- setup is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It does the job. The scope has limited range ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. The scope has limited range in dark places and clarity is a little weak to spot details, but it works if you don't have a more high powered scope with you. If you can add extra light in the area you are looking it will improve the distance in dark places. It's acceptable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AimBri

customer_reviews.title: A must have tool
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for viewing inside walls, engine compartments, vents and other hard to reach areas. The setup is incredibly easy...after fully charging the camera and downloading the app to my phone the WiFi was immediately accessible as was the viewing through my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M

customer_reviews.title: Very good product; simple instructions made the download and installation ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product; simple instructions made the download and installation a snap. The scope wire is flexible and firm, the camera does a great job in displaying things clearly and the overall construction feels strong. I would recommend this product. It is great for auto use. I had a noise in my door panel but the cause was never detected on several visits to the dealer. Often, but not routinely, when I would turn, the noise was heard, like a ball rolling around bumping. I was able to find the cause, (a bolt had fallen loose) with the scope. Not only did I find the cause, but another problem as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Works great, especially for the price. I was expecting junk but the picture is very clear and light bright. No complaints! I was at first scared how bad the instructions were, but you just download the app, turn unit on, use your phone to connect to the wifi the unit is broadcasting (you need the wifi pw from instructions, other than that you dont need them for anything), and when you connect wifi go into the app and its automatically connected and working with the video on your phone. The app has "save photo" and "save video" buttons. Didnt need the instructions for anything else except what LED was for charging status and what LED showed wifi status.
customer_reviews.author: TurboMike

customer_reviews.title: Works as discribed.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it does not have to connect to the phone. Love the extra length. I use it for hunting clogs in some of the drain pipes. The battery lasts average length of time. It is easy to use and set up. Still waiting for the promised storage bag. Been almost a month. Should have had it in 5 days as they promised.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Don't change the password!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you change the password , and get a new phone and can't remember the password. It will never work again! Major flaw in this product, no way to reset my password or do anything with it again. It's now a paper weight in my toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: PittsFam

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm, money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. I purchased this camera to inspect a very long dryer vent duct at my house. The ductwork is over 20 feet long and I needed a long reach to do the full inspection so I got the 10 meter version. The app was easy to download and only took me about 3 mins start to finish to have the camera image on my iPhone. Now that I have set it up it only takes about 20 seconds to have it up and running. The image quality is excellent. I can envision many uses for this camera now that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: GGG

customer_reviews.title: This is not for putting down a drain pipe because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not for putting down a drain pipe because the cord the camera is attached to is not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: not very useful. it would probably be good for drains though
customer_reviews.text: This device does work, however the angle is way too narrow. looking into an engine you will only see a spot in front of you VERY close. And that from 4" away. not very useful. it would probably be good for drains though.
customer_reviews.author: dddfort

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed by this product at all. It's conditions of perfect it may work but good luck getting the picture to be right side up and controlling it as you run into an opening. I would look for something a little more expensive next time.
customer_reviews.author: Yakalackin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for at home diagnostics
customer_reviews.text: Great product for at home diagnostics. Used to try and find source of water leak inside an interior wall. Pros include easy setup, good picture image, long cable length. Con would be that cable isn't totally rigid, so hard to direct it if using inside a wall or similar enclosed space. Overall very satisfied for the price.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Solid product with one issue
customer_reviews.text: This product seems solid as advertised. One problem I ran into with my specific phone (Essential phone PH1) is that I had to ensure cellular data was off before the WiFi connection would work. Not that big of an issue and I'm not sure if that is more of a phone issue than an issue with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Petersen Perspective

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread !!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty doggoned amazing for the price. You can see things inside of walls and under floors as long as you has a 1/4" or larger access point. I used mine to discover that my HVAC contractor had forgotten to close off one of my return air runs and it was allowing cold air in from the eave vents !!! Probably will save me thousands of dollars over the coming years...
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a nice product
customer_reviews.text: If you put it in any type of plumbing lines, it will get dirty and you will have to repeat the cleaning plenty of times, it is also a little to weak in strength of cable...
customer_reviews.author: Jerome B.

customer_reviews.title: Picture not clear
customer_reviews.text: This product is not hard to set up, however it doesn't delivery clear picture and the battery dead in couple minutes. I am very disappointed. Will ask to return
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and works great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and works great with iOS/iPhone7. Use the dial on the side of the power module to turn on and set the brightness of the LED light. This 10m camera is shapable and not flimsy like some of the other scopes. I am using this to view areas under the deck of my boat to assist in running LED lights and power lines.
customer_reviews.author: boxerman

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried with some of the comments but it was very simple to set up although I do understand some frustration from others since the instructions are somewhat misleading for iPhone users. Simply download the "WiFi View" app, turn on the endoscope, go to your phone Settings, select Wi-Fi and choose the "Jetion_fb308afa" network. Launch the WiFi View app and it works perfectly. I've only owned it for one day so can't comment on long-term reliability but it seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Reneau

customer_reviews.title: Nice complete kit and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice price, good image quality in dry environment but less show in plumbing environment that has water. But the case plus the many uses I have for this device is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: redrover

customer_reviews.title: this is an amazing product. In the short time I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, this is an amazing product. In the short time I have had it, it has proven to be an indispensable tool in getting at hard to reach places within the roof, behind sinks, and behind difficult to move stereo cabinets. No doubt there will be other projects for it coming up. The THZY endoscope has come through and exceeded my expectations in terms of image quality and the ease of use with the iOS app. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Beverley H

customer_reviews.title: beware
customer_reviews.text: thzy endoscope would never charge and would never come on . very disappointed in this purchase. should have known Chinese made. buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Works great Runs Extremely hot
customer_reviews.text: Wow took me a bit to connect as I misplaced directions but then found it on their website. Looks to work great still have to try it for what I order it for. Camera does run hot but other then that looks to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Kellee R

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble searching and finding "Jetion_********" WIFI network on G9+ cell phone. WIFI did not recognize the internet connection at first but finally worked. Finally working well with good picture and have not tested the battery duration yet.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: IF you want the Chinese to have your contacts, pictures, and files, well then this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly do not know if this works or not as I have cut the cord and smashed the box. When an endoscope app asks me for my permission to see contacts, pictures, and files, then after clicking Deny, I get (I'm guessing) the same question in Chinese!! You cannot skip this step...so in the garbage it goes.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: This borescope worked great for what it was
customer_reviews.text: This borescope worked great for what it was. The only thing I wish THZY did with this was to add a little marker/ indicator to show where the top of the camera is. Is always a little confusing when I move the camera left, and the display moves right.
customer_reviews.author: Kele P.

customer_reviews.title: making it useless for intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I tried using it to inspect PVC pipe of irrigation system. Since tip/camera cannot be controlled, it repeatedly angled directly into sidewall of pipe such that I could not see remainder of inside of pipe, making it useless for intended purpose. Tomorrow will try it tied to fish tape, an idea I'm borrowing from an online You Tube post..
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Not stiff enough for drains
customer_reviews.text: If you're buying it to look into drains forget it. The 1st curve it hits, its over. Good picture quality but not stiff enough
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Product synced up to my phone easily. I haven't used it on a clog yet but I can't wait to see what lies beneath in my houses old drains. Pretty cool how it has a light at the end to light up the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, for a while.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a while, but for some reason there is a small gasket between the unit and the lens, presumably to prevent the LEDs from washing out the image. The little gasket has moved itself over the camera, and part of the LEDs. I can't seem to get this to move back. I assume this is due to the warmth of the LEDs, and the glue that was used being weak.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: poor image quality
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is definitely NOT HD. There are options to change the resolution and each one is poor. At about 2inches away is clearest but not HD. Anything closer it becomes hazy and anything farther it is like watching an old tube tv.
customer_reviews.author: Mako

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but if I get 20 minutes out of the battery I’d be lucky. Picture quality is good but battery life needs help Tried to look into a 6” pipe for cracks. I could get 12’ in and was hard to push through without stuffing cord and not getting anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong sturdy wire
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, easy to connect to wifi. Quality is good for being able to see what you're looking for. Not HD quality but you shouldn't need HD quality if you're using this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Justusemyname

customer_reviews.title: Good resolution and color
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Works as advertised. Instructions could be a little clearer, but once the app was installed and the battery charged, it was up and running. Picture is just a little jumpy but clear once the lens was still. Good resolution and color. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble to unwind.
customer_reviews.text: LED lights are a joke. After a 24 hour charge I could not even see under my sink much less down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisV

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well
customer_reviews.text: Camera actually looks good, and plenty of length to really reach down in. I used in larger pipe so it was very difficult to see, but I think smaller pipes would probably work well.
customer_reviews.author: Da Beef

customer_reviews.title: Totally Bad
customer_reviews.text: You can't distinguish any of the images. It's only in focus at about 1-2". You can't see down the duct. It's a useless item.
customer_reviews.author: Steven The Realtor

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: So far we have found about 1,000 uses for this thing. i bought one for my father in law and my dad they both love them. They are super easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product, with the flat edge around the lens ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, with the flat edge around the lens makeit hard to push through turns whereas if the end of the lens was rounded like a ball it would negotiate turns and other interferences more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Go n

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I Ordered!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my order the other day. I bought the Wireless Endoscope, so I could look in the duct work in my house. It only took a download of an app and it was up and running. I looked in the duct work it worked great. It is a bonus that it has a light that works well and has a dial on the side to turn off the light or lower the brightness of the light. It was so much fun I looked down my drain and up my husband's nose. Great fun!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gil

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for pipe inspections
customer_reviews.text: Just got the camera - Cannot comment yet on Battery Life or Durability. Got it to go into sewer pipe to find out what the problem is. The cable is not hard enough to go through the pipe - I taped it to a pipe snake, but didn’t work either. The product is good, just not to inspect your pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and useful
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. The stiffness of the cord is perfect. Stiffness of cord is perfect. Gives a lot of flexibility. There is only two reasons that this did not get a 5: (1) focus is fixed, this is good and bad but has not caused an issue yet. (2) there is not clear instructions for using the attachments on the camera. The product itself is great quality and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this to use in his engines etc. so far the picture quality is good and its able to find those pesky little lost things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a quailty endoscope
customer_reviews.text: I just received my THZY model WHB endoscope and set it up on my iPhone X in about 2 minutes. The picture quality is great and the LED's illuminate surrounding areas well. You have the ability to record a video or save a photo onto your phone. The resolution of the camera is adjustable. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GBS

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it to hook up to WIFI
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in December and tried to use for the first time. I keep getting a message that the unit was not able to log on. What if I need to use it in a place where there is no internet? I reached out to seller using email provided on package, with no response. $45 wasted unless I get support to get it working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, useful toy / tool
customer_reviews.text: Great new tool for looking at the inside of anything. Nice semi-rigid long optics give good flexibility but good control. Recommend it. Using it with my iPhone and my iPad mini. Good definition with both.
customer_reviews.author: JCF

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, connector broke off after a couple months of light use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months. Used it on a couple projects and liked the functionality. After about the 5th time charging it, thought, the micro usb connector snapped off completely and went into the housing. Now I have a useless paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as well as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Needed to locate a plumbing blockage but it refused to turn the first corner in a 2" pipe. So, back in the box and in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Gouldthorp

customer_reviews.title: worked nicely
customer_reviews.text: worked great with a friends newer android cell phone, had problems with my older s3 Samsung, but my phone is very old. Was able to look into wall cavity to see no pipes or electrical conduit so construction was able to proceed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect to phone and clear view
customer_reviews.text: This is better then I thought it would be it was easy to use and install. My husband has issue with technology so I was a little worried he would have issues connection it. But he got it the first time. The picture is clear and vary detailed. We will be using this on many jobs to come. Thanks for helping our business needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy junkert

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: For some reason or another we bought this item last year but only started using it now, it is a total disappointment. The idea is good but the app that comes with it it is absolutely horrible. I would give it zero stars if I could. We tried the app in 4 different devices and none of them work and without the app the camera is useless. Stay away from this product
customer_reviews.author: N CT

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems of good quality but the picture is not good at all it’s so blurry you can’t really tell what your looking at. I would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value all in one package
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work really well, it is bright, you can see in tight areas. It was very easy to down load and easy to use on my phone. Very well made. Thanks for the very fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: The side view mirror set that they recommend does not work with this camera
customer_reviews.text: It's decent for the money. The side view mirror set that they recommend does not work with this camera, I have no idea why they would be selling these together.
customer_reviews.author: DragonTattooz

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it.. It was super easy to set up on my Android phone. Took less than 5 minutes and I was ready to go. The picture quality is great from 3cm away you can see every detail.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Boyce

product_meta.title: Wireless Endoscope THZY 1200P HD 10m WiFi Borescope Inspection Camera 2.0 Megapixels Snake Camera for Android iOS Smartphone, iPhone, Tablet iPad Blue
feature_bullets: The Newest WiFi Endoscope Android smartphone(Above Android 2.3),and iPhone IOS system(Above IOS 6.0) both are work. This is perfect for iPhone or android user who want do inspection work.

HD 2nd Light Interface Controller : The camera equipped with 6 circled HD tempered light leds that can greatly reduce image over-exposure, exhibits outstanding color temperature when using in dark environment.
High Resolution Camera Featuring with 2 Megapixels HD camera, with three adjustable resolutions 320x240, 640x480, 1280 x 720.

TECHNOLOGICAL - Advances in camera and LED miniaturization technology has allowed us to bring you an affordable snake inspection camera with a diameter of just 8mm, with excellent image quality and bright illumination.

100% Satisfaction Guarante：1.-blue light mean WiFi signal 2.- It cannot transfer voice to phone. THZY team offers every customer 100% satisfaction guarantee. Don't never about Amazon's 30 limited days return time, we offer every customer a 1 year warranty with 100% Money off guarantee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars629 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
